Previous: sīNext: su

√sīv 'sew'

present: [4.] sī́vyati etc. V.+  sī́vyate  

[perfect: siṣeva  asīṣivat  asevīt  seviṣyati  sevitā  ]

verbal: syūtá V.+  syūtvā  -sī́vya  

secondary: intensive: seṣīv-   -- desiderative: siseviṣa-  susyūṣa-   -- causative: sevayati  sīvayati  

derivatives: syū́  sīvaka C.  sīvya C.  seva B.  sevana B.+  sīvana B.+  sevitavya C.  sū́tra AV.+  sūná V.B.S.  syuman V.B.  syoná? V.B.S.  

The noun sūcī́ (of which sūcay 'point out' is a denominative) can hardly be connected with this root.
